text:
Education: B.E Computer Science
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 0
Date of the Offer: July 2017
Company: Accolite Software India Pvt Ltd
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: ₹8,00,000
Bonus: ~ ₹2,00,000 (You will get it, if you stay in the company for two years, else you need to return this amount)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Allowance): ~ ₹10,00,000
Benefits: 12 paid sick leave days + 12 paid casual leave days + 10 Indian Holidays + Health Insurance
